https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wMSFktfQO0X3vNQefJfHJQdAkxu.jpg Ivan, Lionel, Jenny and Elena, four young teen from a neighborhood on the outskirts of Madrid, begin a journey towards the sea fleeing the misery around them. On the way you will find love and solidarity, everything that they have in their environment. In their wake they leave their signature on the walls ... a 'graffiti "is their hallmark. Arena en los bolsillos
